verbose_text: A negative correlation between the expression of a psuedogene of B-Raf proto-oncogene, serine/threonine kinase (BRAF) and the degree of BRAF mutation has been detected in thyroid carcinoma; BRAF overexpression can effectively promote the transformation of NIH3T3 cells and induce tumorigenesis in nude mice.
evidence: expression of a psuedogene of B-Raf proto-oncogene, serine/threonine kinase
